named-native-query.name: OmissaoModel.buscaPorIe
named-native-query.query: select * from USUARIOCAT..tb_ome_omissao_empresa where ome_ie = ?1 and ome_dtsaida is null order by ome_ano, ome_mes

named-native-query.name: OmissaoModel.buscaPorCnpj
named-native-query.query: select * from USUARIOCAT..tb_ome_omissao_empresa where ome_cnpj = ?1 and ome_dtsaida is null order by ome_ano, ome_mes

named-native-query.name: OmissaoModel.buscaPorAnoMes
named-native-query.query: select * from USUARIOCAT..tb_ome_omissao_empresa where ome_ano = ?1 and ome_mes = ?2 and ome_dtsaida is null order by ome_ie

named-native-query.name: OmissaoModel.buscaPorRbaMenorQue
named-native-query.query: select * from USUARIOCAT..tb_ome_omissao_empresa where ome_rba < ?1 and ome_dtsaida is null order by ome_rba

named-native-query.name: OmissaoModel.buscaPorRbaIgualA
named-native-query.query: select * from USUARIOCAT..tb_ome_omissao_empresa where ome_rba = ?1 and ome_dtsaida is null order by ome_rba

named-native-query.name: OmissaoModel.buscaPorRbaMaiorQue
named-native-query.query: select * from USUARIOCAT..tb_ome_omissao_empresa where ome_rba > ?1 and ome_dtsaida is null order by ome_rba

named-native-query.name: OmissaoModel.buscaPorDataEntrada
named-native-query.query: select * from USUARIOCAT..tb_ome_omissao_empresa where cast(ome_dtentrada as date) = ?1 and ome_dtsaida is null order by ome_ie

named-native-query.name: OmissaoModel.buscaTodos
named-native-query.query: select * from USUARIOCAT..tb_ome_omissao_empresa where ome_dtsaida is null order by ome_ie, ome_ano, ome_mes
